body_html:
Hi @petecoup ,
I am not concerned with code right now. If I could get TF to build AMDGPU target, that would make life lot easier. Is it possible for you to try out my forked version of TF? As long as the tf shared library has all the routines inside AMDGPU target, I can figure out a way to use them inside xla code.

body:
Hi @petecoup ,
I am not concerned with code right now. If I could get TF to build AMDGPU target, that would make life lot easier. Is it possible for you to try out my forked version of TF? As long as the tf shared library has all the routines inside AMDGPU target, I can figure out a way to use them inside xla code.
